ygData.authorName: These are the Daves I Know
ygData.from: These are the Daves I Know <douglas@...
ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hey, when people learn to edit, maybe the edit rants will stop?  Give it a shot. =) -- We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 23 Aug 1999, Omeg Felligan wrote:

> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> oh god not the "please, please, please edit" rant from EQBrewers again....
> :(
>

Hey, when people learn to edit, maybe the edit rants will stop? Give it
a shot. =)
--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
